item.description:
This is one in a series of presentations that Phillip Werner, a co-organizer with the random group, will be making this summer.

While you can use our site to coordinate with other randomites you MUST register for this event with REI by clicking here.

=====

Backpacking Coast-to-Coast Across Scotland (educational series)

Time: 6:30 p.m. - 8:00 p.m.

Presenter: Philip Werner

REI Boston
401 Park Drive
Boston, MA 02215

Phone: (617) 236-0746

Join blogger and section hiker Philip Werner as he recounts his experiences backpacking across the Scottish Highland. Last May, Philip Werner hiked coast-to-coast through the heart of the Scottish Highlands, from the east coast to the west, a distance of 170 miles. Walking cross-country like this is very different from hiking a trail in the US and requires a high degree of competence in navigation, survival techniques, backcountry camping and mountaineering experience. If you've ever been interested in hiking or mountain climbing in Scotland, Philip will describe his route planning process, including Scottish geography and climate, and show gorgeous pictures of Scotland's mountains, waterfalls, and landscape. Philip Werner blogs about hiking and backpacking at http://SectionHiker.com. When he's not section hiking the Appalachian Trail, he spends most of his time roaming the White Mountains.
item.name: Backpacking Coast-to-Coast Across Scotland (educational series)
